A supposed glitch in the popular "Find My iPhone" app has been directing random strangers to the home of an unsuspecting Texas dad at all hours of the day, falsely accusing him of stealing their ele…
articles.content:
Now if the homeowner blew away someone for behaving in a threatening manner, yeah, that'd be a textbook stand your ground defense.
Actually, it wouldn't be.
;)
To be more accurate, it wouldn't be … [+1069 chars]

articles.title: Baidu sues Apple, app developers over fake Ernie bot apps - Reuters
articles.description: Chinese search engine giant Baidu (9888.HK), has filed lawsuits against "relevant" app developers and Apple Inc (AAPL.O)…
articles.content: SHANGHAI, April 8 (Reuters) - Chinese search engine giant Baidu (9888.HK), has filed lawsuits against "relevant" app developers and Apple Inc (AAPL.O) over fake copies of its Ernie bot app available … [+1151 chars]
